awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 16 nominations.

fullplot: The true story of The Temptations, the Soul vocal group of the 1960s, as seen from the viewpoint of the last surviving member, Otis Williams. Beginning from their humble origins in the late 50s and continuing through the 90s and the deaths of the other 4 members.
plot: Biography of the singers who formed the hit Motown muisical act, The Temptations.
title: The Temptations
